description: Represents a gallery item with properties related to title, user, date, likes, views, and discussion board.

properties.name: title
properties.description: The title of the gallery item.

properties.name: user_name
properties.description: The name of the user who posted the gallery item.

properties.name: date_posted
properties.description: The date when the gallery item was posted.

properties.name: like_count
properties.description: The count of likes received by the gallery item.

properties.name: view_count
properties.description: The count of views received by the gallery item.

properties.name: discussion_board
properties.description: An object representing the discussion board related to the gallery item.

properties.name: id
properties.description: A unique identifier for the gallery item.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of the gallery item, which can be 'project', 'block', or 'lesson'.

properties.name: visibility
properties.description: The visibility setting of the gallery item, which can be 'organization', 'classroom', or 'public'.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the gallery item and sends data to the specified database.
methods.returnsDescription: A promise that resolves when data is successfully sent to the database.
